body.name: Nuwave OxyPure H13 TRUE HEPA Air Purifier for up to 857 Sq Ft, Medium-Sized Spaces, Remove 99.97% of Airborne Dust, Mold, Smoke, Pollen, Allergies, Pet Dander & Hair, Odor, Ozone Free, Pet Friendly
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 15 mins
features: INDOOR AIR POLLUTION - EPA estimates that the air indoors can be as much as 5 TIMES more polluted than outdoors. If you suffer from fatigue, headaches, congestion, coughing, and sneezing, you may be exposed to poor air quality conditions in the home.
ALLERGY RELIEF – Soothe congestion, watery eyes, sneezing & other allergy symptoms by purifying the air of allergens and allergy triggers that can irritate the sinuses, nasal passages, and lungs.

OZONE FREE OxyPure True HEPA doesn’t utilize UV-C light, which can produce harmful ozone. It is also California Air Resource Board (CARB) certified to comply with that state’s stringent testing, electrical safety, and ozone requirements.

3 FAN SPEEDS – OxyPure True HEPA is designed with simplicity in mind. A single button turns the unit ON and OFF and controls 3 fan speeds from LOW, MEDIUM, to HIGH. You can manually select the right fan speeds at any time.

ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED – Even when operating 24/7, the annual electricity cost is less than $10! Check with your local utility company to determine if a portion of the purchase qualifies for a rebate. It is also FCC and ETL certified.

PURIFY UP TO 857 SQ FT - Unseen to the naked eye, you may unwittingly be inhaling billions of unseen pollutants and allergens into your lungs with every breath you take. OxyPure True HEPA is proven to effectively purify 857 sq. ft. area in 1 hour.
WHAT’S INCLUDED – OxyPure True HEPA Air Purifier with 1 combination True HEPA and carbon filter and the cylinder body serving as the pre-filter and 1 owner’s manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For best results and product performance, use the Nuwave replacement filter (search B0C1THJ6NR)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and low volume!
reviews.reviewText: This thing moves some air, cleans it and does it all without being so loud you can’t think. Very easy to figure out. It’s a bit taller than I expected. I can definitely tell a difference in our bedroom. I don’t wake up with same clogged head or sinus issues bits removing a lot of allergens and dirt from the air!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well, but the instructions could include more details
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier seems to work well. I ordered it mainly to remove pollutants and allergens, and these are typically odorless so I can only assume the unit is working as intended. That is, I can't say the air smelled any fresher or cleaner.I like the white color and smallish size. The product description says you can toss it into most carry-on luggage to take with you, but honestly it's a little too heavy and big for me to seriously consider doing that. I could see taking it on a car road trip or packing it into your RV, but I personally wouldn't fly with it.The unit is definitely whisper quiet on the lowest setting, tolerable on the medium setting, and downright loud on the highest setting. So if you're expecting quiet operation on all three speeds, that isn't the case. I plan to keep it on the lowest setting during the night when I'm sleeping, and use the other settings when noise isn't a concern.The product description says this cleans 857 sq. ft. in about an hour, but it doesn't say which setting. I assume on the highest setting it cleans that well, so I could have used more information about how long it takes to clean that area on the medium and low settings.Which brings up another question: How do you tell when you're done and can switch off the unit? In the interest of saving electricity and prolong filter life I'd want to use the unit only until the area was "cleaned" instead of having it running all the time. I wish there were some sort of indicator light or gauge that would let me know the current cleaning status. This is my first air purifier, so I don't know if this feature is available on any air purifier. Maybe you just have to guess with all of them.All in all, I'm pleased with this unit and expect that it will perform as promised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathe Easy Excellence
reviews.reviewText: The Nuwave OxyPure is a game-changer for air quality. Covering up to 857 sq ft, it eliminates 99.97% of airborne particles. From dust and mold to pet dander and odors, this purifier ensures a fresh and allergen-free environment. Ozone-free and pet-friendly, it's a powerhouse for medium-sized spaces. Five stars for transforming my home into a haven of clean, pure air!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and effective
reviews.reviewText: I've been running this in our bedroom for a few weeks and really like it. It is extremely quiet at medium and low settings and easy to sleep with. I haven't really tried high but believe it may disturb me trying to fall asleep.Our big Lab sleeps in our room and spends plenty of time getting filthy dirty. The unit helps with the odors and the air is overall much improved - even on the low setting with the door open.It's a relatively small and unobtrusive unit which is nice. For it's size, it packs a nice punch and is a great way to improve the air quality of a bedroom or similar sized room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and quiet
reviews.reviewText: I use it in a guest bedroom fairly small size. very quiet mode. Seems to help clean sir after leaving it on for a few hours. Not too large so portable. Good to have. Seems to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy and sleek air filter with HEPA but no UV
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice slim air filter unit with HEPA filter. Quiet and has 3 fan settings. Black plug standard. Works well. Cylinder shape to suck in air and filter from 360 degrees. I sit it on floor but you can sit on a desk or table if you want like a large lamp. I wish it has UV to kill germs but it is fine for your dust clearing needs. I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nuwave OxyPure H13 TRUE HEPA Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the Nuwave OxyPure H13 TRUE HEPA Air Purifier in my bedroom. It improves my sleep quality, by providing a cleaner environment. The air purifier provides good coverage for my room. With its three-stage filtration system, it effectively captures dust, pollen, mold, odors, and allergens, and it operates quietly, too.Maintenance is easy; the HEPA filter has a warning light indicating when replacement is needed. The compact, lightweight design allows it to be easily carried from room to room., and the three adjustable fan speeds offer customizable air circulation via a single button so I can easily choose the level of air circulation I want.For anyone seeking a great air purification device, the Nuwave OxyPure H13 TRUE HEPA Air Purifier comes highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use, replacement filters are very reasonable
reviews.reviewText: I got this air purifier for our garage and it works great! It is so easy to set-up and use. 1 single button does everything. The number of times you press the button adjusts the fan speed. We had it unboxed, registered, and running in less than 15 minutes. You just have to make sure to remove the bag around the hepa/carbon filter and lock the base back in place, plug-in, and purify. The manual suggests changing the filter every 6 to 12 months, which Amazon also carries and right now they’re only $16 (regular price is $22, which still is very reasonable). When you register the product you can opt in for a free1 year warranty. I am very happy with this air purifier, so much so that I plan to order more for other rooms in my home,
